title: Executive Order 5556-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Potawatomi Indians of Kansas
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in the act of June 21, 1906 (34 Stat. 325-326), that the trust period on allotments made to members of the Prairie Band of Potawatomi Indians of Kansas, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1931, be, and the same is hereby, extended for a period of 10 years.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5556-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Potawatomi Indians of Kansas Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276833
